title: Champion Men's Joggers, Lightweight Lounge Pants, Jersey Graphic Pants for Men, 31"
description: THE FIT - Standard-fit men's lounge joggers with a 31" inseam.
THE FEEL - These lightweight pants are made from soft 6.1 oz. cotton or a cotton blend that is perfect for everyday wear.
ADDED COMFORT - Lounge pants with an internal drawcord for adjustability and comfort.
POCKETS - Two deep side pockets hold lightweight tech.
SPOT THE C - These men’s joggers feature the iconic C logo at the hip.
Note: C logo patch color may vary from image.
